database.defaultValue: SELECT name FROM sys.databases WHERE database_id > 4;

database epplanation.defaultValue: This query retrieves the names of all databases from the sys.databases system view where database_id is greater than 4, which excludes system databases like master, tempdb, model, and msdb.

table.defaultValue: SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE';

sqlReaderQuery.value:
UPDATE [dbo].[control_table1] SET status='sucess' WHERE TableName = '@{item().TableName}';
SELECT 'SUCCESS' AS STATUS

source.sqlReaderQuery:
UPDATE [dbo].[control_table1] SET status='fail' ;
SELECT 'SUCCESS' AS STATUS
